name: Measured Basal Diameter
title: Measured Basal Diameter
notes:
**Note 1:** Physician statement of measured basal diameter (not the same as tumor size) can be used to code this data item when no other information is available. 

**Note 2:** Code Measured Basal Diameter of tumor not size. Record actual measurement in millimeters (mm) to nearest tenth from clinical documentation, or from a pathology report if surgery performed.
rows:
0.1 – 99.9 millimeters (mm)
(Exact measurement to nearest tenth of mm)

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code XX.8 may result in an edit error.)

Not documented in medical record
Cannot be determined by pathologist
Measured Basal Diameter not assessed or unknown if assessed
